translations.source: of
translations.target: of

translations.source: 5.1.5	混凝土工程
translations.target: 5.1.5	Concrete Works

translations.source: 1)混凝土工程施工工艺流程
translations.target: 1) Construction Process Flow for Concrete Works

translations.source: 施工临时跑道架设→基层的清洁和浇水→商品混凝土运输→楼面及屋面结构混凝土浇筑→混凝土养护
translations.target: Erection of temporary construction access trackway → cleaning and wetting of the base course → transport of ready-mixed concrete → concrete placement for floor slabs and roof structural members → concrete curing

translations.source: 2)施工临时跑道架设→基层的清洁和浇水→商品混凝土运输→楼面及屋面结构混凝土浇筑→混凝土养护
translations.target: 2) Erection of temporary construction access trackway → cleaning and wetting of the base course → transport of ready-mixed concrete → concrete placement for floor slabs and roof structural members → concrete curing

translations.source: 3)浇筑前的检查工作
translations.target: 3) Pre-pouring Inspection

translations.source: ①检查模板的标高、位置和构件的截面尺寸是否符合设计要求。
translations.target: 1) Check whether the formwork elevation and position, and the member cross-sectional dimensions, meet the design requirements.

translations.source: ②检查模板支撑是否稳固，模板固定是否牢固。
translations.target: 2) Check whether the formwork supports are stable and whether the formwork is securely fixed.

translations.source: ③检查模板的紧密性。模板的缝隙应嵌紧。
translations.target: 3) Check the tightness of the formwork. Formwork gaps shall be tightly sealed.

translations.source: ④检查钢筋和预埋件的规格、数量、安装位置以及构件的接头连接焊缝是否符合设计和施工规范的要求。
translations.target: 4) Check whether the specifications, quantities, and installation locations of reinforcement and embedded parts, as well as the joint connection welds of members, meet the requirements of the design and construction specifications.

translations.source: ⑤检查水、电、暖气等设备管道的位置和数量是否准确。
translations.target: 5) Check whether the locations and quantities of pipelines for water, electricity, heating, etc. are accurate.

translations.source: ⑥模板内钢筋上的垃圾、木屑、刨花、锯末、污物、油污等应清理干净。
translations.target: 6) Trash, wood chips, shavings, sawdust, dirt, oil stains, etc. on the reinforcement inside the formwork shall be thoroughly cleaned.

translations.source: ⑦将残留在模板内的杂物清理干净，并提前对模板进行浇水
translations.target: 7) Remove any debris remaining in the formwork and wet the formwork in advance.

translations.source: ⑧做好混凝土配合比和现场计量设备
translations.target: 8) Prepare the concrete mix proportion and the on-site measuring equipment.

translations.source: 4)混凝土墙板浇筑
translations.target: 4) Concrete Wall Panel Pouring

translations.source: a为防止混凝土墙板模板变形，同时在初凝后4小时内完成上下混凝土搭接，不留水平施工缝，一次浇筑高度一般控制在1500mm左右，应沿长度方向均匀浇筑，严禁一次到顶。
translations.target: a To prevent deformation of the formwork for concrete wall panels, the upper and lower concrete shall be lapped within 4 hours after initial setting, without leaving horizontal construction joints. The single lift height is generally controlled at about 1,500 mm. Concrete shall be placed uniformly along the length direction, and pouring to full height in one operation is strictly prohibited.

translations.source: 浇筑顺序：分段定点，倾斜部位倾斜分层浇筑，逐级推进，一次到位。
translations.target: Pouring sequence: place concrete by segments at fixed points; for inclined sections, place concrete in inclined layers; advance level by level; complete the placement in one continuous operation.

translations.source: b每台泵在操作面上配备2-4个插入式振动器。根据泵送混凝土自然流入坡面的条件，在坡面末端布置两台振动器。第一种布置在混凝土出料点，解决上部混凝土的夯实问题；二是设置在混凝土坡脚，保证下部混凝土密实。随混凝土浇筑工作面推进时，振捣器应跟上，振捣时应严格控制浇筑时间、移动距离和插入深度。严禁用振动棒振捣钢筋，严禁用模板振捣混凝土。混凝土应采用反振法振捣。
translations.target: b Each pump shall be equipped with 2–4 immersion vibrators at the working face. Based on the conditions for pumped concrete to naturally flow into the slope surface, two vibrators shall be arranged at the end of the slope surface. One is arranged at the concrete discharge point to address the compaction of the upper concrete; the other is set at the toe of the concrete slope to ensure the lower concrete is dense. As the concrete pouring work face advances, the vibrators shall follow. During vibration, the pouring time, moving distance, and insertion depth shall be strictly controlled. It is strictly prohibited to vibrate reinforcement with a poker vibrator, and strictly prohibited to vibrate concrete using the formwork. Concrete shall be vibrated using the re-vibration method.

translations.source: 在浇筑过程中，我们应经常注意观察模板、钢筋、预埋件、柱插筋等是否有位移或变形。如果发现问题，应及时处理。
translations.target: During pouring, attention shall be paid frequently to whether the formwork, reinforcement, embedded parts, column dowels, etc. have any displacement or deformation. If any issues are found, they shall be handled promptly.

translations.source: 5)框架柱混凝土浇筑
translations.target: 5) Concrete Pouring for Frame Columns

translations.source: a浇筑前，应先对柱底进行浇水，并填充厚度为5-10厘米的1:2水泥砂浆。柱混凝土应分层浇筑。插入振捣时，每层厚度不应大于50cm，振捣器不应接触钢筋。
translations.target: a Before pouring, the column base shall be wetted and filled with 1:2 cement mortar with a thickness of 5–10 cm. Column concrete shall be poured in layers. During insertion vibration, the thickness of each layer shall not exceed 50 cm, and the vibrator shall not contact the reinforcement.

translations.source: b混凝土浇筑完成后，应将柱钢筋布置到位，并将梁内的钢筋和混凝土清理干净。
translations.target: b After concrete pouring is completed, the column reinforcement shall be positioned in place, and the reinforcement and concrete inside the beams shall be cleaned.

translations.source: 6）楼板结构浇筑施工方法
translations.target: 6) Construction Method for Pouring Floor Slab Structures

translations.source: a混凝土浇筑时，应提前设置施工通道，确保混凝土浇筑的安全。
translations.target: a Prior to concrete pouring, construction access passages shall be set up in advance to ensure safety during pouring.

translations.source: b梁板混凝土同时浇筑时，采用“砂浆打入法”从一端开始浇筑。即根据梁的高度，将梁的混凝土分层浇筑成阶梯状，到达板底时，梁和板的混凝土同时浇筑，随着阶梯状的延伸，继续浇筑梁和板混凝土。
translations.target: b When beam and slab concrete are poured simultaneously, the "mortar charging method" is adopted, starting from one end. That is, according to the beam height, the beam concrete is poured in layers to form a stepped profile. When the slab soffit is reached, the beam and slab concrete are poured simultaneously. As the stepped profile extends, continue pouring the beam and slab concrete.

translations.source: c现浇板的铺设厚度应略高于板的厚度，并应使用板振捣器沿垂直浇筑方向来回振动。在振动过程中，应随时检查表面标高和表面平整度。振捣后，应使用长木抹子抹平。
translations.target: c For cast-in-place slabs, the placement thickness shall be slightly higher than the slab thickness, and a plate vibrator shall be used to vibrate back and forth along the direction perpendicular to the pouring direction. During vibration, the surface elevation and flatness shall be checked at all times. After vibration, a long wooden float shall be used to level the surface.

translations.source: 7)混凝土配及供应注意事项
translations.target: 7) Notes on Concrete Batching and Supply

translations.source: a现场应成立临时指挥小组，加强车辆的调整和平衡，减少混凝土运输时间和停车场等待时间。
translations.target: a A temporary on-site command team shall be established to strengthen vehicle dispatching and balancing, and to reduce concrete transport time and waiting time in the parking/staging area.

translations.source: b在各类作业场所，应按指定区域和地点操作和堆放机具、材料，并规划和安排车辆行驶路线，避免混乱，确保安全顺利行驶。
translations.target: b At all types of work areas, equipment and materials shall be operated and stacked in designated areas and locations. Vehicle routes shall be planned and arranged to avoid disorder and to ensure safe and smooth passage.

translations.source: c配备足够的照明、施工机具和维护人员，确保所有施工机具的正常运行。
translations.target: c Provide sufficient lighting, construction equipment, and maintenance personnel to ensure normal operation of all construction equipment.

translations.source: d混凝土施工前召开专项协调会，制定专项施工技术措施和组织方案
translations.target: d Prior to concrete works, convene a special coordination meeting and develop specific construction technical measures and an organizational plan.

translations.source: e严格控制混凝土坍落度，从搅拌车上卸入泵车料斗前，应随机检查混凝土坍落度。如坍落度有偏差，应及时联系搅拌站进行调整。搅拌混凝土时，严格按照配合比进行，并根据砂石含水率的不同随时进行调整，以保证混凝土本身的质量。
translations.target: e Strictly control the concrete slump. Before discharging from the mixer truck into the pump hopper, the slump shall be randomly checked. If there is any deviation, promptly contact the batching plant for adjustment. During mixing, strictly follow the mix proportion and make timely adjustments according to the moisture content of aggregates to ensure the inherent quality of the concrete.

translations.source: 5.1.6	砌体工程
translations.target: 5.1.6	Masonry Works

translations.source: 1)工艺流程
translations.target: 1) Process Flow

translations.source: 施工准备→墙壁放线→砂浆的制备→放置三层实心砖→多孔砖的排列→铺设砂浆→放置多孔砖→校正→垂直接缝灌浆砂浆→接合
translations.target: Construction preparation → wall setting-out → mortar preparation → lay three courses of solid bricks → arrange perforated bricks → spread mortar → lay perforated bricks → alignment/adjustment → grout mortar into vertical joints → joint finishing

translations.source: 2)施工准备
translations.target: 2) Construction Preparation

translations.source: a在建墙之前，地板应该清洗干净并浇水。
translations.target: a Before wall construction, the floor shall be cleaned and wetted.

translations.source: b用经纬仪重新测量各外角的轴线垂直度。
translations.target: b Re-measure the verticality of the axis lines at each external corner using a theodolite.

translations.source: c根据复测后的轴线尺寸，弹出中心线、门窗开启线，经技术部门审核后办理预检手续。
translations.target: c Based on the rechecked axis dimensions, snap the centerline and door/window opening lines. After review by the technical department, complete the pre-inspection procedures.

translations.source: d根据各楼层的标高尺寸，搭设层柱，并在层柱上注明门窗洞口、木砖、拉结筋、过梁的标高尺寸。层柱之间的距离应控制在10-15m。每个角落都需要楼层杆。层柱应垂直放置，并牢固地放置在同一标高上。复验后，应做好复验记录。
translations.target: d According to the elevation dimensions of each floor, set up storey poles and mark on them the elevations for door/window openings, timber blocks, wall ties, and lintels. The spacing between storey poles shall be controlled within 10–15 m. Each corner shall be provided with a storey pole. Storey poles shall be set vertically and firmly at the same elevation. After rechecking, recheck records shall be completed.

translations.source: e根据底部第一块砖的标高，全面检查。水平灰缝厚度大于20mm时，应采用细石混凝土找平。
translations.target: e Conduct a comprehensive inspection based on the elevation of the first brick at the base. When the thickness of the horizontal mortar joint exceeds 20 mm, fine aggregate concrete shall be used for leveling.

translations.source: f要建造多孔砖墙，首先应在地面或地板上放置三层实心砖。此外，当多孔砖铺设到梁底时，最后一层应使用实心砖。
translations.target: f For perforated brick walls, three courses of solid bricks shall first be laid on the ground or floor. In addition, when the perforated brickwork reaches the beam soffit, the final course shall be laid with solid bricks.

translations.source: g在布置多孔砖时，上层和下层应交替接缝。搭接长度一般为多孔砖的1/4，但不小于60mm。不得使用角度损伤严重的多孔砖。
translations.target: g When laying perforated bricks, the upper and lower courses shall have staggered joints. The lap length is generally 1/4 of the perforated brick length, but not less than 60 mm. Perforated bricks with severely damaged corners shall not be used.

translations.source: h水平灰缝控制在8-12mm左右，用砂浆填满，保证平直、平整。垂直接缝应用砂浆填充
translations.target: h Control the horizontal mortar joint to about 8–12 mm and fully fill with mortar to ensure straightness and evenness. Vertical joints shall be filled with mortar.

translations.source: i拉线砌筑时，应在测量前立即进行浇筑，采用挂线、靠尺的方法，保证墙体的垂直度。
translations.target: i When laying masonry using a string line, the laying shall be carried out immediately after setting-out. Use a string line and straightedge to ensure wall verticality.

translations.source: 3)质量要求
translations.target: 3) Quality Requirements

translations.source: a多孔砖的品种、规格、强度应符合设计要求。此外，还应提供出厂合格证和复验报告
translations.target: a The type, specifications, and strength of perforated bricks shall meet the design requirements. In addition, factory certificates and re-test reports shall be provided.

translations.source: b砂浆的品种必须满足设计要求，强度必须符合设计要求和检验评定标准。
translations.target: b The type of mortar shall meet the design requirements, and the strength shall comply with the design requirements and inspection/evaluation standards.

translations.source: c错缝墙砌体必须采用密实砂浆砌筑。接头必须是平直。
translations.target: c Staggered-joint masonry shall be laid with dense mortar. Joints shall be straight.

translations.source: 5.1.7	抹灰工程
translations.target: 5.1.7	Plastering Works

translations.source: a抹灰前，应仔细清除基层表面的灰尘、污垢和油污。
translations.target: a Before plastering, dust, dirt, and oil stains on the substrate surface shall be carefully removed.

translations.source: b抹灰工程开工前，施工单位应办理结构验收手续。
translations.target: b Before plastering works commence, the contractor shall complete the structural acceptance procedures.

translations.source: c应检查墙壁的平整度。坑太多应凿除或用1:3水泥砂浆找平；墙上的脚手架洞应该修补并浇水。
translations.target: c Check the flatness of the wall. Excessive depressions shall be chiseled out or leveled with 1:3 cement mortar. Scaffold holes on the wall shall be repaired and wetted.

translations.source: d管道通过的墙或楼板孔洞应密封，不得渗水。
translations.target: d Openings in walls or floor slabs through which pipes pass shall be sealed, with no water seepage.

translations.source: e外墙的窗台、过梁、雨棚、压顶等，应在顶部做流水坡，在底部做滴水或滴水槽。食品柜的深度和宽度应大于10mm，排列整齐、平整。
translations.target: e For external walls, window sills, lintels, canopies, parapet caps, etc. shall have a drainage slope on the top, and drips or drip grooves at the bottom. The depth and width of the drip groove shall be greater than 10 mm and shall be arranged neatly and evenly.

translations.source: f水泥砂浆和水泥混合砂浆的抹灰层应在前一层抹灰层设置好后进行。
translations.target: f Plaster coats of cement mortar and cement-mixed mortar shall be applied after the previous plaster coat has been properly set.

translations.source: g室内墙面、柱面、门洞均应设置1:2水泥砂浆护角，护角高度不小于2m，每侧宽度不小于50mm。
translations.target: g Interior wall surfaces, column surfaces, and door openings shall be provided with 1:2 cement mortar corner guards. The corner guard height shall be not less than 2 m, and the width on each side shall be not less than 50 mm.
5.1.8	Doors and Windows

translations.source: a门窗应垂直堆放，垂直坡度不大于20度，有防雨措施。
translations.target: a Doors and windows shall be stored vertically with an inclination of no more than 20 degrees, and rain protection measures shall be provided.

translations.source: b门窗安装前，应根据图纸要求和设计规定，检查门窗及所附五金件的型号、规格、数量是否正确
translations.target: b Before installing doors and windows, check whether the models, specifications, and quantities of the doors/windows and the associated hardware are correct in accordance with the drawings and design requirements.

translations.source: c门窗必须水平和垂直安装，高度和深度一致。安装后，开口叶片闭合后，间隙不大于1mm。此外，车门开关灵活，无卡涩或回弹现象
translations.target: c Doors and windows shall be installed level and plumb, with consistent height and depth. After installation, when the operable leaf is closed, the gap shall be no greater than 1 mm. In addition, the door leaf shall open and close smoothly, without binding or rebound.

translations.source: d密封条安装后应留有膨胀余量。一般情况下，板条应比门窗装配侧长20-30mm。转弯处应断开倾斜面，并用粘合剂牢固粘合，以避免产生收缩缝。
translations.target: d After installation, sealing strips shall allow for expansion. In general, the strip shall be 20–30 mm longer than the assembled side of the door/window. At corners, cut off the inclined face and bond firmly with adhesive to avoid shrinkage joints.

translations.source: e、门窗框安装固定采用锚铁支架。可以预埋尾部铁支架，也可以用锤钻钻10mm孔预埋连接膨胀螺栓。除不锈钢外，连接铁件、固定件等均应进行防腐处理。
translations.target: e Door/window frames shall be fixed using anchor-iron brackets. Tail brackets may be pre-embedded, or 10 mm holes may be drilled with a rotary hammer to embed and connect expansion bolts. Except for stainless steel, connecting iron parts, fasteners, etc. shall be treated with corrosion protection.

translations.source: 5.1.9	涂层施工
translations.target: 5.1.9	Coating Works

translations.source: a清理墙、柱表面剥落、松散的材料，铲灰，擦拭墙、柱面。
translations.target: a Remove flaking and loose materials from wall and column surfaces, scrape off loose plaster, and wipe wall/column faces clean.

translations.source: b第一遍满刮腻子打磨：室内大面积涂料表面填补缝隙后，用镶嵌工具满刮乳胶腻子。对所有微砂眼和收缩缝进行全面刮腻子，做到密实、平整、线角整齐。同时，涂层应沿墙横向连续刮涂，并尽可能薄，不得漏刮。接缝处不得留有杂物，注意不要污染门窗等表面
translations.target: b First full putty coat and sanding: after filling joints on large interior coated surfaces, use a trowel to apply latex putty over the entire surface. Apply putty to all pinholes and shrinkage cracks to achieve a dense and even finish with neat lines and corners. Meanwhile, apply continuously in horizontal passes along the wall, as thin as possible, with no missed areas. Keep joints free of debris, and avoid contaminating surfaces such as doors and windows.

translations.source: c第二遍满刮腻子并打磨：第二遍全刮腻子的方法与第一遍相同，但刮腻子的方向应与第一遍相互垂直，即沿墙面垂直刮腻子，再进行满刮腻子，并打磨墙面，以保证平整、光滑。
translations.target: c Second full putty coat and sanding: the method is the same as the first coat, but the putty application direction shall be perpendicular to that of the first coat, i.e., apply putty vertically along the wall surface, then apply over the full surface and sand to ensure flatness and smoothness.

translations.source: d第一道涂层：在第一道涂层之前，必须清洁基层表面，并擦拭浮尘。使用宽刷子进行涂层是合适的。涂刷顺序一般是从上到下、从左到右、从边线到转角、从小面到大面。内角不得有残留涂层，外角不得有包边。如果墙面不能一次从上到下涂刷，应协同向下涂刷多个层次，避免接缝与涂刷重叠。每次应在独立表面上涂覆同一批涂层。
translations.target: d First coat: before the first coat, the substrate surface shall be cleaned and loose dust wiped off. A wide brush is suitable for coating. The brushing sequence is generally top to bottom, left to right, from edges to corners, and from small areas to large areas. No residual coating shall remain in internal corners, and no edge build-up shall occur at external corners. If the wall cannot be brushed from top to bottom in one pass, coordinate multiple tiers downward to avoid overlap between joints and brushing. Each time, apply the same batch of coating on an independent surface.

translations.source: 5.2	钢结构
translations.target: 5.2	Steel Structures

translations.source: 5.2.1	钢结构制作
translations.target: 5.2.1	Steel Structure Fabrication

translations.source: 钢结构由业主提供，运至施工现场指定位置，进场后需进行验收，检查构件几何尺寸、焊缝质量、防腐涂层等，验收合格后方可使用。
translations.target: The steel structure shall be provided by the owner and transported to the designated location at the construction site. Upon arrival, acceptance inspection shall be carried out, including checks of member geometric dimensions, weld quality, anticorrosive coating, etc. It shall be used only after passing acceptance.

translations.source: 5.2.2	钢结构安装
translations.target: 5.2.2	Steel Structure Erection

translations.source: 1)基础复测
translations.target: 1) Foundation Re-survey

translations.source: 基础资料一次性移交。控制点、控制线、控制基础的位置必须清晰、完整，交接资料必须符合要求。
translations.target: Foundation data shall be handed over at one time. The control points, control lines, and foundation control positions shall be clear and complete, and the handover documents shall meet the requirements.

translations.source: 重新检查构件的几何尺寸和长度，将轴线和标高位置放置在适当的位置，并做出明显的标记，为安装施工做好准备。
translations.target: Recheck the geometric dimensions and lengths of members, set the axis lines and elevation positions at appropriate locations, and make clear marks to prepare for erection.

translations.source: 2)安装前的准备工作
translations.target: 2) Preparations Before Erection

translations.source: a钢结构出厂验收：根据设计文件，所有构件均按相关标准进行验收。
translations.target: a Factory acceptance of steel structures: according to the design documents, all members shall be accepted in accordance with relevant standards.

translations.source: b总承包方和发包方代表应指定专人负责构件验收。
translations.target: b Representatives of the general contractor and the employer shall designate dedicated personnel responsible for member acceptance.

translations.source: c每个部件都有合格的部件出厂证书
translations.target: c Each component shall have a qualified factory certificate.

translations.source: d所有部件均附有材料合格证或材料复验报告。
translations.target: d All components shall be accompanied by material certificates or material re-test reports.

translations.source: e所有部件应正确、清晰地编号。
translations.target: e All components shall be correctly and clearly numbered.

translations.source: 3)钢支架吊装
translations.target: 3) Lifting of Steel Supports

translations.source: 钢支架采用单台起重机吊装。为保证钢支架的顺利吊装，钢支架吊装前，应将临时脚手架和爬梯固定在地面上，并画出中心标高的三角形标记，挂上固定的缆索。将钢支架吊装到基础上，将钢支架中心与基础中心对齐，移动吊钩，用缆索和垫铁调整钢支架的垂直度，用千斤顶校正钢支架的水平偏差，拧紧地脚螺栓（见下图）。
translations.target: The steel supports shall be lifted using a single crane. To ensure smooth lifting, before lifting, temporary scaffolding and ladders shall be fixed on the ground, triangular marks at the center elevation shall be drawn, and fixed guy ropes shall be hung. Lift the steel support onto the foundation, align the center of the steel support with the center of the foundation, move the hook, adjust the verticality of the steel support with guy ropes and shim plates, correct the level deviation with a jack, and tighten the anchor bolts (see figure below).

translations.source: 用千斤顶校正钢支架的水平偏差
translations.target: Correct the level deviation of the steel support using a jack.

translations.source: 上部结构安装完成后，通过二次灌浆固定钢支架底部。
translations.target: After the upper structure is installed, the base of the steel support shall be secured by secondary grouting.

translations.source: 4)皮带通廊吊装
translations.target: 4) Lifting of Belt Conveyor Gallery

translations.source: a皮带通廊运输到现场后，吊装前应进行质量审查，检查有无运输引起的扭曲和下弯，有无装卸车引起的边缘波浪形弯曲，有无侧弯和下弯。以上情况均应在地面上进行处理，经检查合格后方可进行吊装。
translations.target: a After the belt conveyor gallery is transported to the site, a quality review shall be carried out before lifting. Check whether there is twisting or downward deflection caused by transport, whether there is wavy edge bending caused by loading/unloading, and whether there is lateral bending and downward deflection. Any such issues shall be treated on the ground. Lifting may proceed only after passing inspection.

translations.source: b最初对皮带通廊进行校准，然后临时固定以进行定位。皮带通廊的校正包括三个方面，即平面轴线、高程和垂直度。
translations.target: b First align the belt conveyor gallery, and then temporarily fix it for positioning. The alignment includes three aspects: plan axis, elevation, and verticality.

translations.source: c皮带通廊中心轴线的校正以钢支架的轴线为基础，确定皮带通廊的位置，同时检查钢支架的相对跨度。皮带通廊吊装时，钢支架要固定稳定。用水准仪检查皮带通廊的标高，以皮带通廊两端的标高为标准。在皮带通廊中间检查皮带通廊的垂直度采用挂线法对钢廊的垂直度进行检查和控制。皮带通廊必须在确认符合质量标准后才能用螺栓固定。
translations.target: c The alignment of the center axis of the belt conveyor gallery shall be based on the axis line of the steel supports to determine the position of the belt conveyor gallery, while checking the relative span of the steel supports. During lifting, the steel supports shall be fixed and stabilized. Use a level to check the elevation of the belt conveyor gallery, using the elevations at both ends as the reference. Check the verticality at the middle of the belt conveyor gallery using the plumb-line method to inspect and control the verticality of the steel gallery. The belt conveyor gallery may be bolted only after confirming compliance with quality standards.

translations.source: 5.3	屋面板安装
translations.target: 5.3	Roof Panel Installation

translations.source: 5.3.1	工艺流程
translations.target: 5.3.1	Process Flow

translations.source: 施工准备→检查檩条规格和放置尺寸→板匹配→放置并固定彩钢板→浇水试验→检查和验收
translations.target: Construction preparation → check purlin specifications and setting dimensions → panel matching → place and fix color-coated steel sheets → water spray test → inspection and acceptance

translations.source: 5.3.2	施工准备
translations.target: 5.3.2	Construction Preparation

translations.source: 完成所有准备工作后，再放置和固定夹芯板。
translations.target: After all preparations are completed, place and fix the sandwich panels.

translations.source: 检查檩条规格、间距和坡度是否符合设计要求，屋面板端部除设置檩条支撑外，中间部分增设檩条。
translations.target: Check whether the purlin specifications, spacing, and slope meet the design requirements. In addition to purlin supports at the ends of the roof panels, additional purlins shall be provided in the middle section.

translations.source: 5.3.3	板面布置
translations.target: 5.3.3	Panel Layout

translations.source: 根据设计图纸和实际屋面尺寸，绘制板材布置图，作为切割依据，切割板按顺序编号。
translations.target: According to the design drawings and the actual roof dimensions, draw a panel layout plan as the basis for cutting, and number the cut panels in sequence.

translations.source: 彩钢板安装
translations.target: Installation of Color-Coated Steel Sheets

translations.source: 板的放置垂直水平对齐，长（纵向）搭接位于檩条处（双檩条或檩条侧焊接连续角钢），支撑长度≥50mm。
translations.target: Panels shall be placed aligned plumb and level. The long (longitudinal) lap shall be located at the purlin (double purlins, or continuous angle steel welded to the purlin side), and the bearing length shall be ≥50 mm.

translations.source: 搭接方向沿最大年风向，纵向搭接长度：屋面坡度≥10%时为200mm，＜10%时为250mm；端部（横向）搭接沿水流方向，长度按板材类型确定。
translations.target: The lap direction shall follow the prevailing annual maximum wind direction. Longitudinal lap length: 200 mm when the roof slope is ≥10%, and 250 mm when it is <10%. End (transverse) laps shall follow the direction of water flow, with lengths determined by the panel type.

translations.source: 从檐口一端向另一端和屋脊方向同时放置，通过墙板固定夹与墙体固定。
translations.target: Place panels from one end of the eave toward the other end and toward the ridge simultaneously, and fix them to the wall using wall-panel fixing clips.

translations.source: 每块屋面板两端支架通过自攻螺钉与檩条固定：纵向连接间距≤350mm，每块板与同一檩条和墙梁连接不少于3点，其他连接不少于2点；屋脊和檐口处多点连接。
translations.target: The brackets at both ends of each roof panel shall be fixed to the purlins using self-tapping screws: longitudinal connection spacing ≤350 mm; each panel shall be connected to the same purlin and wall beam at no fewer than 3 points, and other connections at no fewer than 2 points; provide multi-point connections at the ridge and eave.

translations.source: 钻孔时垂直穿过屋面板和檩条，先垫防水密封垫圈，再套橡胶板和不锈钢压盖，拧紧螺栓。
translations.target: When drilling, drill vertically through the roof panel and purlin. First place a waterproof sealing washer, then fit the rubber pad and stainless-steel cover plate, and tighten the bolts.

translations.source: 面板连接采用间距100-500mm的铆钉，长搭接处放置全长密封条，端部放置两个连续密封条。
translations.target: Panel connections shall use rivets with spacing of 100–500 mm. Full-length sealing strips shall be placed at long laps, and two continuous sealing strips shall be placed at the ends.

translations.source: 夹芯板用带防水垫圈的镀锌螺栓固定，固定点在波峰上，外露螺钉涂密封材料；螺栓拧紧后，用硅酮密封胶密封板搭接处。
translations.target: Sandwich panels shall be fixed with galvanized bolts with waterproof washers. Fixing points shall be at the crest, and exposed screws shall be coated with sealing material. After bolts are tightened, seal the panel laps with silicone sealant.

translations.source: 长搭接处用拉铆钉连接，拉铆钉涂硅酮密封剂，用金属或塑料压盖保护。
translations.target: Long laps shall be connected with blind rivets. The blind rivets shall be coated with silicone sealant and protected with metal or plastic cover caps.

translations.source: 固定位置要求：屋面自攻钉、拉铆钉在波峰处；墙面在波谷处。
translations.target: Fixing location requirements: roof self-tapping screws and blind rivets shall be at the crests; wall fasteners shall be at the troughs.

translations.source: 淋水试验
translations.target: Water Spray Test

translations.source: 屋面板固定后，进行至少2小时淋水试验，检查是否渗漏，发现问题及时修补。
translations.target: After the roof panels are fixed, conduct a water spray test for at least 2 hours to check for leakage; repair promptly if any issues are found.

translations.source: 检查和验收
translations.target: Inspection and Acceptance

translations.source: 先进行内部检查，处理质量问题后，组织发包人验收，办理验收手续。
translations.target: Conduct internal inspection first. After addressing quality issues, organize acceptance by the employer and complete the acceptance formalities.

translations.source: 成品保护
translations.target: Finished Product Protection

translations.source: 施工时保护屋面外层钢板不受划伤，及时清理杂物，严禁堵塞落水管、天沟。
translations.target: During construction, protect the outer steel sheet of the roof from scratches, clean debris promptly, and strictly prohibit blocking downpipes and gutters.

translations.source: 彩钢板堆放场地平整坚实，分层堆放，轴承座沿长度方向放置；人工搬运不移动重叠钢板，机械吊装使用专用吊索。
translations.target: The storage site for color-coated steel sheets shall be level and firm, and sheets shall be stacked in layers with bearing housings placed along the length direction. During manual handling, overlapping steel sheets shall not be shifted; for mechanical lifting, dedicated slings shall be used.

translations.source: 5.4	预埋件
translations.target: 5.4	Embedded Parts

translations.source: 5.4.1	预埋螺栓安装
translations.target: 5.4.1	Installation of Embedded Anchor Bolts

translations.source: 螺栓组组合：按图纸设计下料，单个螺栓按要求焊接组合，误差≤1mm。
translations.target: Bolt group assembly: cut materials according to the drawing design, and weld and assemble individual bolts as required, with tolerance ≤1 mm.

translations.source: 螺栓组安装：根据设计要求，测量垂直和水平轴线到设备基础四边，测量水平标高到基础一侧，定位并焊接螺栓组，定位后重复测量，再测量与相邻螺栓组的间隙。
translations.target: Bolt group installation: according to design requirements, measure the vertical and horizontal axes to the four sides of the equipment foundation, and measure the horizontal elevation to one side of the foundation. Position and weld the bolt group. After positioning, re-measure, and then measure the clearance to adjacent bolt groups.

translations.source: 所有螺栓按示意图组装和安装。
translations.target: All bolts shall be assembled and installed according to the schematic.

translations.source: 质量要求
translations.target: Quality Requirements

translations.source: 螺栓焊接牢固，无松动，误差≤1mm。
translations.target: Bolts shall be welded firmly with no looseness, and the tolerance shall be ≤1 mm.

translations.source: 定位点和标高符合设计要求，误差≤2mm，高程控制在0~10mm范围内。
translations.target: Positioning points and elevations shall meet the design requirements. The tolerance shall be ≤2 mm, and elevation shall be controlled within the range of 0–10 mm.

translations.source: 混凝土浇筑过程中螺栓组不移动，浇筑完成后再次测量螺栓位置准确性。
translations.target: During concrete pouring, the bolt group shall not move. After pouring is completed, re-measure to confirm the accuracy of bolt positions.

translations.source: 混凝土浇筑时，用胶带包裹所有暴露螺纹部分进行保护。
translations.target: During concrete pouring, protect all exposed threaded parts by wrapping them with adhesive tape.

translations.source: 5.4.2	预埋铁件
translations.target: 5.4.2	Embedded Steel Items

translations.source: 受力预埋件的锚筋采用热轧钢筋，严禁使用冷加工钢筋。
translations.target: For load-bearing embedded parts, anchor bars shall be hot-rolled reinforcement, and cold-worked reinforcement is strictly prohibited.

translations.source: 预埋钢筋中，应力锚筋不少于4根，直径≥8mm且≤25mm。
translations.target: For embedded reinforcement, the number of stressed anchor bars shall be no less than 4, with diameters ≥8 mm and ≤25 mm.

translations.source: 抗震预埋件的锚筋横截面积比设计值增加25%，相应调整锚固板厚度，锚板附近设置直径≥10mm的闭合箍筋。
translations.target: For seismic embedded parts, the cross-sectional area of anchor bars shall be increased by 25% over the design value, and the thickness of the anchor plate shall be adjusted accordingly. Closed stirrups with diameters ≥10 mm shall be provided near the anchor plate.

translations.source: 预埋件安装：采用钢筋焊接定位固定，测量垂直和水平轴线到基础四边，测量水平标高到基础一侧，定位并焊接预埋件，定位后重复测量，再测量与相邻预埋件的距离，确保定位和标高准确。
translations.target: Installation of embedded parts: use reinforcement welding for positioning and fixing. Measure the vertical and horizontal axes to the four sides of the foundation and measure the horizontal elevation to one side of the foundation. Position and weld the embedded parts. After positioning, re-measure, then measure the distance to adjacent embedded parts to ensure accurate positioning and elevations.

translations.source: 5.5	设备安装
translations.target: 5.5	Equipment Installation

translations.source: 5.5.1	皮带输送机安装
translations.target: 5.5.1	Belt Conveyor Installation

translations.source: 安装前准备
translations.target: Pre-installation Preparation

translations.source: 检查输送机部件是否齐全，型号规格是否符合设计要求，有无运输损坏。
translations.target: Check whether the belt conveyor components are complete, whether the model and specifications meet the design requirements, and whether there is any transport damage.

translations.source: 清理安装场地，确保场地平整、无障碍物，铺设临时运输道路。
translations.target: Clean the installation area to ensure it is level and free of obstacles, and lay temporary transport roads.

translations.source: 检查基础标高、位置尺寸是否符合设计要求，预留孔位置和尺寸准确。
translations.target: Check whether the foundation elevation and position dimensions meet the design requirements, and ensure the reserved hole positions and dimensions are accurate.

translations.source: 安装顺序
translations.target: Installation Sequence

translations.source: 基础验收与测量→机座（含板）和轴承座安装→滚筒安装→托辊安装→输送带铺设→驱动装置安装→拉紧装置安装→安全保护装置安装→电气系统安装→调试。
translations.target: Foundation acceptance and surveying → installation of base frame (including plates) and bearing housings → drum/pulley installation → idler roller installation → conveyor belt laying → drive unit installation → take-up device installation → safety protection device installation → electrical system installation → commissioning.

translations.source: 关键安装要求
translations.target: Key Installation Requirements

translations.source: 输送带的安装：输送带是皮带输送机的主要组成部分，贯穿于皮带输送机的全长。减少输送带的故障率，是提高皮带输送机寿命和降低运行费用的重要方法。
translations.target: Conveyor belt installation: the conveyor belt is the main component of the belt conveyor and runs through its full length. Reducing the belt failure rate is an important method to extend the service life of the belt conveyor and reduce operating costs.

translations.source: 在输送带安装过程中，要保证输送带接头质量必须平直、不起胶、不鼓气泡、黏合紧密、光滑；两卷输送带的中心线不重合度小于3mm。胶带机运转过程中，输送带不打滑、不跑偏，跑偏量不得超过带宽的5%。
translations.target: During conveyor belt installation, ensure that the belt splice quality is straight, with no debonding, no blistering, tight bonding, and a smooth finish. The misalignment of the centerlines of two belt rolls shall be less than 3 mm. During belt conveyor operation, the belt shall not slip or mistrack; the mistracking amount shall not exceed 5% of the belt width.

translations.source: 驱动装置的安装：驱动装置在皮带输送机正常运行时提供牵引力，是皮带输送机的核心装置。
translations.target: Drive unit installation: the drive unit provides traction during normal operation of the belt conveyor and is the core device of the belt conveyor.

translations.source: 驱动装置安装时，要确保皮带输送机中心线和传动滚筒轴线垂直，且在传动滚筒宽度中心线上；确保传动滚筒和转向滚筒轴的水平度不应超过0.3‰，传动滚筒和改向滚筒宽度中心线与皮带输送机纵向中心线不重合度不超2mm，传动滚筒和改向滚筒轴心线与皮带输送机纵向中心线的不垂直度不超滚筒宽度的2‰。
translations.target: When installing the drive unit, ensure that the centerline of the belt conveyor is perpendicular to the axis of the drive pulley and lies on the centerline of the drive pulley width. Ensure that the levelness of the axes of the drive pulley and turning pulley does not exceed 0.3‰. The misalignment between the width centerlines of the drive pulley and bend pulley and the longitudinal centerline of the belt conveyor shall not exceed 2 mm, and the non-perpendicularity between the axes of the drive pulley and bend pulley and the longitudinal centerline of the belt conveyor shall not exceed 2‰ of the pulley width.

translations.source: 驱动装置安装调试时，保证电动机无异常声音、无异常发热和振动现象；减速器试运转时没有异常声音和异常振动现象，箱体表面温度不超标准，齿面无过量磨损，紧固螺栓不松动；制动器和逆止器无异常声音和发热现象，各转动销轴无卡住或异常磨损。
translations.target: During installation and commissioning of the drive unit, ensure that the motor has no abnormal noise, overheating, or vibration. During reducer trial run, there shall be no abnormal noise or vibration; the gearbox surface temperature shall comply with the standard; gear tooth surfaces shall have no excessive wear; and fastening bolts shall not be loose. The brake and backstop shall have no abnormal noise or overheating, and each rotating pin shall have no jamming or abnormal wear.

translations.source: 托辊与机架的安装：托辊安装在机架上，对输送带起支撑作用，使输送带悬垂度不超规定要求。要求托辊转动灵活，且与皮带输送机中心线垂直，托辊无异常声音和卡死现象。机架中心线与皮带输送机纵向中心线不重合度不超3mm；机架两槽钢对应点相对高低差不超3mm。
translations.target: Installation of idlers and frame: idlers are installed on the frame to support the conveyor belt so that belt sag does not exceed the specified requirements. Idlers shall rotate flexibly and be perpendicular to the centerline of the belt conveyor, with no abnormal noise or seizure. The misalignment between the frame centerline and the longitudinal centerline of the belt conveyor shall not exceed 3 mm, and the relative height difference between corresponding points of the two channel steels of the frame shall not exceed 3 mm.

translations.source: 拉紧装置的安装：拉紧装置可以补偿输送带弹性和塑性形变，使输送带有足够的张力，防止皮带输送机打滑。
translations.target: Take-up device installation: the take-up device compensates for elastic and plastic deformation of the conveyor belt so that the belt has sufficient tension and prevents belt conveyor slippage.

translations.source: 拉紧装置钢丝绳不能有生锈和断丝现象，输送带不能出现松弛现象；尽量安装在靠近传动滚筒的空载分支上，有利于启动和制动时不产生打滑现象；尽量安装在输送带张力最小的地方，从而减小拉紧力。
translations.target: The steel wire rope of the take-up device shall have no rust or broken wires, and the conveyor belt shall not be slack. It should be installed as close as possible on the no-load strand near the drive pulley, which helps prevent slippage during starting and braking. It should be installed where the belt tension is minimal to reduce the take-up force.

translations.source: 保护装置的安装：防滑保护装置安装在皮带输送机回程带上面，对于固定皮带输送机，防滑保护装置装在机头卸载滚筒与驱动滚筒之间。
translations.target: Installation of protective devices: the anti-slip protection device shall be installed above the return belt of the belt conveyor. For fixed belt conveyors, the anti-slip protection device shall be installed between the head discharge pulley and the drive pulley.

translations.source: 堆料保护安装在两部皮带输送机搭接处，保护触头应在卸载滚筒前方吊挂，保护触头吊挂高度不得高于卸载滚筒下沿。
translations.target: Pile-up protection shall be installed at the transfer point between two belt conveyors. The protection contact shall be suspended in front of the discharge pulley, and the suspension height shall not be higher than the lower edge of the discharge pulley.

translations.source: 跑偏保护成对安装，且机头、机尾处各安装一组，使用专用托架固定在皮带输送机机架上。
translations.target: Mistracking protection shall be installed in pairs, with one set installed at both the head and tail. It shall be fixed on the belt conveyor frame using dedicated brackets.

translations.source: 温度传感器安装在皮带输送机的主动滚筒附近，温度探头应紧贴主滚筒外壁。
translations.target: The temperature sensor shall be installed near the drive pulley of the belt conveyor, and the temperature probe shall be closely attached to the outer wall of the drive pulley.
